title: ON WHAT FUCKING PLANET DID RIOT THINK THAT THIS NEW DARK HARVEST WAS A GOOD IDEA
body:
EVERY FUCKING GAME A PLAY SOMEONE HAS DARK HARVEST AND THEY GET FREE STACKS FOR SOMEONE GETTING SOMEWHAT LOW LIKE WHAT THE ACTUAL FUCK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I CAN'T GO ANYWHERE WITHOUT THIS BULL SHIT LIKE DON'T FUCKING WAIT FOR THE NEXT PATCH FIX THIS FUCKING NOW. 
IT'S SO FUCKING BULLSHIT

replies.body: Your capslock appears to be broken, captain.
